update.description:
Issues #402 and #1834

Undo / redo:

* Inserting simple shape links

* Inserting custom DAE links

* Inserting custom SVG links

* Copy/pasting links

* Deleting links with the DEL key

* Deleting links via context menu

Also fixes issue #1834. Once this is merged I can backport the fix to `gazebo7`.


~~Issue #1861: The tests only pass if you run them one by one. They have been disabled on Jenkins.~~

content.raw:
I looked into the failures and they weren't caused by the removal of `stop`, but by the rest of the code. I fixed them locally and queued a new [gpu build](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/220/)

:heart: tests
content.html:
I looked into the failures and they weren't caused by the removal of stop, but by the rest of the code. I fixed them locally and queued a new gpu build

tests

content.raw:
Ok, now there are test [results](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/219/testReport/). There are 2 new failures:

* ModelEditorTest.EditModel -> [1st failure](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/219/testReport/%28root%29/ModelEditorTest/EditModel/history/) -> fixed 028f15e

* ~~TrackVisualTest.TrackVisual~~ -> Failing from [before](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/219/testReport/%28root%29/TrackVisualTest/TrackVisual/history/)

* ~~BuildingMaker_TEST.Layers~~ -> fixed on PR #2196, to be ported to default

* ~~ModelData_TEST.Clone, ModelData_TEST.LinkScale~~ -> [1st failure](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/219/testReport/%28root%29/ModelData_TEST/Clone/history/) -> fixed 2d76dec

* ~~CameraTest.Follow~~ -> Failing from [before](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/219/testReport/%28root%29/CameraTest/Follow/history/)

* ~~UNIT_ImagesView_TEST~~ -> Failing from [before](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/219/testReport/UNIT_ImagesView_TEST/xml/_empty_/history/)

* ~~ModelAlign_TEST.AlignXMin~~ -> Failing from [before](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/219/testReport/%28root%29/ModelAlign_TEST/AlignXMin/history/)
content.html:
Ok, now there are test results. There are 2 new failures:

  • ModelEditorTest.EditModel -> 1st failure -> fixed 028f15e

  • TrackVisualTest.TrackVisual -> Failing from before

  • BuildingMaker_TEST.Layers -> fixed on PR #2196, to be ported to default

  • ModelData_TEST.Clone, ModelData_TEST.LinkScale -> 1st failure -> fixed 2d76dec

  • CameraTest.Follow -> Failing from before

  • UNIT_ImagesView_TEST -> Failing from before

  • ModelAlign_TEST.AlignXMin -> Failing from before
